"},{"rule_code":"CD","rule_title":"CHILD DISCOUNTS","rule_text":" FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 09JUL2017 AN ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 YEARS OF AGE - CHARGE 67 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR- CH AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER. OR - FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 09JUL2017 AN UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-14 YEARS OF AGE - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR- CH NOTE - ADDITIOANAL CHARGE FOR UNACCOMPANIED CHILD TRANSPORTATION IS APPLIED AT EUR 20 PER TICKET BY EMD. AN UNACCOMPANIED CHILD UNDER 5 YEARS - TRAVEL NOT PERMITTED. OR - FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 09JUL2017 AN INFANT UNDER 2 YEARS OF AGE AND NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR- IN AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER. OR - FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 09JUL2017 AN INFANT UNDER 2 YEARS OF AGE AND OCCUPYING A SEAT - CHARGE 67 PERCENT OF THE FARE. NOTE - UNACCOMPANIED INFANT UNDER 2 YEARS - TRAVEL NOT PERMITTED AT THIS FARE. OR - FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 10JUL2017 AN UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-14 YEARS OF AGE - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR- CH NOTE - ADDITIOANAL CHARGE FOR UNACCOMPANIED CHILD TRANSPORTATION IS APPLIED AT EUR 20 PER EACH SECTOR OF TRANSPORTATION BY EMD. AN UNACCOMPANIED CHILD UNDER 5 YEARS - TRAVEL NOT PERMITTED. OR - FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 10JUL2017 AN INFANT UNDER 2 YEARS OF AGE AND NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF THE FARE. TICKET DESIGNATOR- IN AND PERCENT OF DISCOUNT MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER. "}],[{"rule_code":"RU","rule_title":"RULE APPLICATION","rule_text":" HY CARRIER 5TH LEVEL EXCURSION FARES APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN AREA 3. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE WAY AND ROUND TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE WAY/ROUND TRIP/CIRCLE TRIP/OPEN JAW JOURNEYS. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS THAT THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGEMENT. OTHER CONDITIONS BOOKING CODES- FOR VE12M/VE1M/VLE12M/VHE12M/VPR1M/VE3M1 RBD-V FOR NE12M/NPR6M RBD-N FOR OE12M/OPR6M/OPR/ORU/OE1M RBD O FOR YRURT RBD-Y FOR UPR RBD- U FOR SPR RBD S FOR HPR RBD H FOR LPR RBD L FOR SE12M RBD S ORIGINATING BKK FOR VLE12M/VHE12M ON BKK-TAS RBD V ON TAS-BKK RBD V/K ORIGINATING TAS FOR VLE12M/VHE12M - RBD V FOR FARE BASIS NPR1M - RBD N
"},{"rule_code":"MX","rule_title":"MAX STAY","rule_text":"FOR OPR3M FARES RETURN TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 3 MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.
"},{"rule_code":"SR","rule_title":"SALES RESTRICT","rule_text":" TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/AFTER 25MAR2018. BETWEEN AREA 3 AND UZBEKISTAN ORIGINATING AREA 3 - FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 04MAY2018 TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN UZBEKISTAN/UNITED STATES. NOTE - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE FOLLOWING STOCK AND PLATE HY-250 ONLY ORIGINATING AREA 3 - FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 05MAY2018 TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN UZBEKISTAN. NOTE - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE FOLLOWING STOCK AND PLATE HY-250 ONLY
"},{"rule_code":"AP","rule_title":"ADVANCE RES/TKT","rule_text":"NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT APPLY. RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 2 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 24 HOURS AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. OR - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 1 DAY BEFORE DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 3 HOURS AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. OR - RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS. WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 3 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 1 HOUR AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. OR - RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS AND TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME TIME.

THIS RULE APPLIES THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. I. NO SHOW FEE APPLIES IF THE PASSENGER IS NO SHOW ON ANY FLIGHT SEGMENT IN ADDITION TO THE PENAL- TY CHARGE. CHANGES AFTER DEPARTURE CHARGE KZT 4500 FOR REISSUE. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - ANYTIME PERMITTED FOR REISSUE AND NO-SHOW. STAY/MAX.STAY/SEASONALITY/ETC. MUST BE MET. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. - 1 CABIN BAGGAGE 5 KG - BAGGAGE ALLOWANCE ONE STANDARD BAG INCLUDES BAG UP TO 10 KG AND 62 LI 158 LCM OR ANY STANDARD BAG EQUIVALENT SUCH AS MUSICAL INSTRUMENT/ ARCHERY EQUIPMENT/ BOWLING BAG/ FISHING EQUIPMENT/ GOLF BAG/ GOLF BAG/ HOCKEY EQUIPMENT/ SKATEBOARD/ SNOW AND WATER SKI EQUIPMENT AT NO CHARGE. ----- FOR BEK AIR AND BEK AIR CONNECTION FLIGHTS ONE SMALL CARRY-ON BAG PLUS ONE PERSONAL ITEM AT NO CHARGE PER PASSENGER ARE ALLOWED AS LONG AS CARRY-ON BAG FITS COMFORTABLY IN THE STANDARTIZATOR WITHOUT BEING FORCED AND DOES NOT EXCEED OVERALL DIMENSIONS OF 45 INCHES /LENGTH PLUS WIDTH PLUS HEIGHT/. MAXIMUM DIMENSIONS CANNOT CANNOT EXCEED ANY OF THE FOLLOWING MEASUREMENTS 22 IN LONG BY 14 IN LONG BY 14 IN WIDE BY 9 IN TALL OR 115 CM /56 BY 36 BY 23 CM/. ALL CARRY-ON ITEMS MUST BE STORED IN AN OVERHEAD BIN. "},{"rule_code":"PE","rule_title":"PENALTIES","rule_text":"FOR SRT1MKZ TYPE FARES CHANGES ANY TIME CHARGE 10 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. CHARGE 20 PERCENT FOR NO-SHOW. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - - CHARGE 5 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION IN CASE OF UPGRADE OUTBOUND AND INBOUND FARE COMPONENTS OF PRICING UNIT FROM RBD E TO Y/J RBD. - CHARGE 10 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION IN CASE OF UPGRADE OUTBOUND FARE COMPONENT FROM RBD E TO Y/J RBD AND INBOUND FARE COMPONENT RBD E IS KEPT WITHOUT CHANGES. - CHARGE 10 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION IN CASE OF UPGRADE INBOUND FARE COMPONENT FROM RBD E TO Y/J RBD AND OUTBOUND FARE COMPONENT RBD E IS KEPT WITHOUT CHANGES. - CHARGE 10 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION IN CASE OF UPGRADE INBOUND OR OUTBOUND FARE COMPONENT FROM RBD E TO ANY OTHER RBDS /EXCEPT ABOVE/. ------ IN CASE OF E PLUS Y/J COMBINATION - CHARGE 5 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION IN CASE OF UPGRADE OUTBOUND FARE COMPONENT FROM RBD E TO Y/J RBD AND INBOUND FARE COMPONENT RBD Y/J IS KEPT WITHOUT CHANGES. ------ IN CASE OF Y/J PLUS E COMBINATION - CHARGE 5 PERCENT FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION IN CASE OF UPGRADE INBOUND FARE COMPONENT FROM RBD E TO Y/J RBD AND OUTBOUND FARE COMPONENT RBD Y/J IS KEPT WITHOUT CHANGES. ------ CHARGE FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION APPLIED FROM EACH CHANGED FARE COMPONENT. ------- REROUTING PERMITTED IF ORIGIN AND DESTINATION OF THE FARE COMPONENT REMAIN THE SAME. ------ IF ANY OF THE COUPONS IS NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE SHOWN ON THE TICKET CHANGES OF UNUSED SEGMENTS ARE NOT PERMITTED ----- REISSUE IS ANY CHANGES REQUIRED TO ISSUE ANOTHER TICKET. REVALIDATION IS CHANGES NOT REQUIRED TO ISSUE OTHER TICKET. ---- UPGRADING - AT ANY TIME WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY. ------ PERIOD VALIDITY FOR SPECIAL FARE WILL BE MAX STAY OF THE FARE FROM THE DATE ON THE FIRST FLIGHT COUPON. ---- IN CASE OF UPGRADING THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN NEW FARE AND THE FARE PAID SHOULD BE COLLECTED. ANY OTHER CHARGES FOR REISSUE SHOULD BE COLLECTED ADDITIONALLY. ---- WHEN END-ON-END COMBINATION THE PENALTY CHARGE FOR EACH PRICING UNIT APPLIES SEPARATELY. ---- NO-SHOW - ADDITIONAL SURCHARGE 20 PERCENT FROM FARE COMPONENT. CANCELLATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE 10 PERCENT FOR CANCEL/REFUND. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER. NOTE - BEFORE DEPARTURE MEANS COMPLETELY UNUSED TICKET. REFUND FARE PAID LESS 10 PERCENT OF PENALTY WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DAY OF TICKET ISSUE. CHARGE FOR CANCELLATION APPLIED FROM EACH FARE COMPONENT. ----- AFTER DEPARTURE CHARGE 10 PERCENT FOR CANCEL/REFUND. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER. NOTE - AFTER DEPARTURE MEANS PARTLY USED TICKET. REFUND THE FARE PAID LESS ACTUALLY FLOWN ONE WAY APPLICABLE FARE ON THE DAY OF DEPARTURE LESS 10 PERCENT OF EACH FARE COMPONENT WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DAY OF DEPARTURE. ----- IF ANY OF THE COUPONS IS NOT USED IN THE SEQUENCE SHOWN ON THE TICKET REFUND OF UNUSED SEGMENTS AND YQ TAXES IS NOT PERMITTED. ----- DEPARTURE - DATE AND TIME ARE SHOWN ON THE FIRST FLIGHT COUPON. ----- NOT USED TAXES MUST BE RETURNED TO THE PASSENGER ANY TIME CHARGE 20 PERCENT FOR NO-SHOW. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER. NOTE - NO-SHOW - ADDITIONAL SURCHARGE 20 PERCENT FROM EACH FARE COMPONENT. ----- FOR REISSUED TICKET WITH UPGRADE FARE RULES APPLIES BY FIRST ISSUED ORIGINAL TICKET FOR CANCEL/REFUND

TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN50. NOTE - PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCE BY A PASSPORT ETC/MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING COPY OF THE APPROPRIATE DOCUMENT/PROOF OF AGE/MUST BE AFFIXED TO THE AUDIT COUPON WHEN ANY DISCOUNT APPLIES ---- UNACCOMPANIED INFANT - NOT PERMITTED.

CHANGES NOTE - CHARGE IS CALCULATED FROM THE FARE AMOUNT OF CHANGED FARE COMPONENT AND IS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM BSR RATE ON THE DATE OF REISSUE. NEW FARE AMOUNT SHOULD BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS AMOUNT. ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE SHOULD BE MET INCLUDING MIN MAX STAY ADVANCE PURCHASE SEASONALTY ETC. FARE AMOUNT-PUBLISHED FARE LEVEL IN CURRENCY OF THE COUNTRY OF COMMENCEMENT OF TRAVEL. REPRICE OF TOTALLY UNUSED FARE IS BASED ON CURRENT FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF NEW TICKET ISSUANCE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. REPRICE OF PARTLY USED FARE IS BASED ON HISTORICAL FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. THE FARE DIFFERENCE IS CONVERTED INTO THE CURRENCY OF REISSUE AT CURRENT BSR RATE. NOTE - 1.2.UPGRADING- ANY TIME WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY. IN CASE OF UPGRADING THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN NEW FARE AND THE FARE PAID SHOULD BE COLLECTED. ANY OTHER CHARGES FOR REISSUE/ REVALIDATION SHOULD BE COLLECTED ADDITIONALLY. ----------------------------------------- FOR REISSUED TICKET WITH UPGRADE FARE RULES APPLY BY FIRST ISSUED ORIGINAL TICKET FOR CANCEL/REFUND. CHARGE IS CALCULATED FROM THE FARE AMOUNT OF REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT AND IS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM BSR RATE ON THE DATE OF REFUND. OTHER UNUSED TAXES SHOULD BE RETURNED TO PASSENGER CANCELLATIONS AFTER DEPARTURE NOTE - 2.2.CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE PERMITTED. AFTER DEPARTURE MEANS PARTLY USED TICKET. IN CASE OF VOLUNTARY CANCELLATION/ REFUND - XP AND YR TAXES ARE NONREFUNDABLE. CANCELLATION OF THE TRANSFER FARE AT THE POINT OF TURNAROUND RT-OW. -SEE PARAGRAPH 2.2.CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. 2.3.3.CANCELLATION AT THE TRANSFER INTERMEDIATE POINT ON OUTBOUND IN CASE OF PARTIAL USE OF FARE COMPONENT. "},{"rule_code":"PE","rule_title":"PENALTIES","rule_text":" NOTE - 1.1.CHANGES PERMITTED -MORE THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 25 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. -LESS THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME AND AFTER DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 30 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. REPRICE OF TOTALLY UNUSED FARE IS BASED ON CURRENT FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF NEW TICKET ISSUANCE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. REPRICE OF PARTLY USED FARE IS BASED ON HISTORICAL FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. THE FARE DIFFERENCE IS CONVERTED INTO THE CURRENCY OF REISSUE AT CURRENT BSR RATE. NOTE - 1.2.UPGRADING- ANY TIME WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY. IN CASE OF UPGRADING THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN NEW FARE AND THE FARE PAID SHOULD BE COLLECTED. ANY OTHER CHARGES FOR REISSUE/ REVALIDATION SHOULD BE COLLECTED ADDITIONALLY. ----------------------------------------- FOR REISSUED TICKET WITH UPGRADE FARE RULES APPLY BY FIRST ISSUED ORIGINAL TICKET FOR CANCEL/REFUND. OTHER UNUSED TAXES SHOULD BE RETURNED TO PASSENGER CANCELLATIONS AFTER DEPARTURE NOTE - 2.2.CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE PERMITTED. AFTER DEPARTURE MEANS PARTLY USED TICKET. CHARGE IS CALCULATED FROM THE FARE AMOUNT OF REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT AND IS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM BSR RATE ON THE DATE OF REFUND. IN CASE OF VOLUNTARY CANCELLATION/ REFUND - XP AND YR TAXES ARE NONREFUNDABLE. CANCELLATION OF THE TRANSFER FARE AT THE POINT OF TURNAROUND RT-OW. -SEE PARAGRAPH 2.2.CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. 2.3.3.CANCELLATION AT THE TRANSFER INTERMEDIATE POINT ON OUTBOUND IN CASE OF PARTIAL USE OF FARE COMPONENT. REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND ACTUALLY FLOWN YOW FARE OF THE USED OUTBOUND SEGMENT IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF DEPARTURE AND THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DATE IS SHOWN ON THE FIRST FLIGHT COUPON. REFUND CHARGE APPLIES AS SHOWN IN PARAGRAPH 2.2. CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. 2.3.4.CANCELLATION AT THE TRANSFER INTERMEDIATE POINT ON INBOUND IN CASE OF PARTIAL USE OF FARE COMPONENT. REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND THE SUM OF ACTUALLY FLOWN OW TRANSFER FARE IN THE SAME OR HIGHER CLASS OF BOOKING AND ACTUALLY FLOWN YOW FARE OF THE USED INBOUND SEGMENT IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF DEPARTURE AND THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DATE IS SHOWN ON THE FIRST FLIGHT COUPON REFUND CHARGE APPLIES AS SHOWN IN PARAGRAPH 2.2. CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. IN CASE OF VOLUNTARY CANCELLATION/ REFUND - XP AND YR TAXES ARE NONREFUNDABLE. {"fares":[{"fare":"OPW","airline_fil":"Z9","airline_market":"Z9","city_depart":"ALA","city_arrive":"TSE"}],"rules":[[{"rule_code":"RU","rule_title":"RULE APPLICATION","rule_text":"FOR ECONOMY OW EXCURSION - 5TH LEVEL FARES ECONOMY CLASS - XS BRAND APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN AREA 3. CLASS OF SERVICE THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE. TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES. FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS. - 1 CABIN BAGGAGE 5 KG - BAGGAGE ALLOWANCE ONE STANDARD BAG INCLUDES BAG UP TO 10 KG AND 62 LI 158 LCM OR ANY STANDARD BAG EQUIVALENT SUCH AS MUSICAL INSTRUMENT/ ARCHERY EQUIPMENT/ BOWLING BAG/ FISHING EQUIPMENT/ GOLF BAG/ GOLF BAG/ HOCKEY EQUIPMENT/ SKATEBOARD/ SNOW AND WATER SKI EQUIPMENT AT NO CHARGE. ----- FOR BEK AIR AND BEK AIR CONNECTION FLIGHTS ONE SMALL CARRY-ON BAG PLUS ONE PERSONAL ITEM AT NO CHARGE PER PASSENGER ARE ALLOWED AS LONG AS CARRY-ON BAG FITS COMFORTABLY IN THE STANDARTIZATOR WITHOUT BEING FORCED AND DOES NOT EXCEED OVERALL DIMENSIONS OF 45 INCHES /LENGTH PLUS WIDTH PLUS HEIGHT/. MAXIMUM DIMENSIONS CANNOT CANNOT EXCEED ANY OF THE FOLLOWING MEASUREMENTS 22 IN LONG BY 14 IN LONG BY 14 IN WIDE BY 9 IN TALL OR 115 CM /56 BY 36 BY 23 CM/. ALL CARRY-ON ITEMS MUST BE STORED IN AN OVERHEAD BIN. PERSONAL ITEM INCLUDES PURSE/ BRIE PURSE/ BRIEF CASE/ LAPTOP BAG OR SIMILAR ITEM THAT DOES NOT EXCEED 40 LIN/ 101 CM/ LENGTH PLUS WIDTH PLUS HEIGHT/ AND MUST FIT UNDER THE SEAT IN FRONT OF PASSENGER. VISIT WWW.BEKAIR.AERO FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION REGARDING OUR CARRY ON BAGGAGE POLICY. FOR THE CARRY ON BAGGAGE POLICY ON FLIGHTS OPERATED BY CARRIERS OTHER THAN BEK AIR CONTACT THE OPERATING CARRIER FOR DETAILS. MORE RESTRICTIVE BAGGAGE RULES MAY APPLY ON SOME FLIGHTS OPERATED BY OUR CODESHARE OR INTERLINE PARTNERS.. CAPACITY LIMITATIONS THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS. THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT OTHER CONDITIONS THE CARRIERS RULES/REGULATIONS AND CONDITIONS OF CARRIAGE AS FOUND IN THIS TARIFF ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE ONLY WHEN REQUIRED BY APPLICABLE LAWS/GOVERNMENT REGULATIONS/ORDERS AND REQUIREMENT.
"},{"rule_code":"MX","rule_title":"MAX STAY","rule_text":"FOR ECONOMY OW EXCURSION - 5TH LEVEL FARES TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 60 DAYS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

"},{"rule_code":"SR","rule_title":"SALES RESTRICT","rule_text":"FOR ECONOMY OW EXCURSION - 5TH LEVEL FARES TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON Z9 AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN KAZAKHSTAN/RUSSIA/RUSSIA (EAST OF THE URALS) TICKETS MAY BE ISSUED BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. "},{"rule_code":"PE","rule_title":"PENALTIES","rule_text":"FOR ECONOMY OW EXCURSION - 5TH LEVEL FARES CANCELLATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE CHARGE KZT 3500. WAIVED FOR ILLNESS OF PASSENGER OR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - THIS RULE APPLIES THE PENALTY SUM FOR EACH MODIFIED FARE COMPONENT. A.REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE IN THE SAME RBD OR HIGHER RBD. B.WAIVED IN CASE OF CERTIFIED DEATH OF PASSENGER OR AN IMMEDIATE FAMILY MEMBER OR ILLNESS WITH LEGAL CONFIRMATION FROM MEDICAL INSTITUTION. CHARGE USD 50.00 FOR NO-SHOW. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. WAIVED FOR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - 1. WAIVERS MUST BE EVIDENCED BY DEATH CERTIFICATE. FAMILY MEMBER- SPOUSE/ CHILDREN INCLUDING ADOPTED/ PARENTS/ BROTHERS/ SISTERS/GRANDPARENTS/ GRANDCHILDREN/ FATHER-IN-LAW/MOTHER-IN-LAW/ BROTHERS-IN-LAW/ SISTERS-IN LAW/SONS-IN-LAW AND DAUGHTERS-IN-LAW TRAVELLING WITH PASSENGER. -------------------------------------------------- 2. FULL REFUND PERMITTED BEFORE DEPARTURE IN CASE OF VISA REJECTION AND ONLY WITH PROVIDED STATEMENT LETTER FROM THE EMBASSY. COPY OF THIS DOCUMENT MUST BE ATTACHED TO ACCOUNT. -------------------------------------------------- 3. CANCELLATION FEE APPLIED FOR EACH FARE COMPONENT - BOTH FOR USED SEGMENT AND FOR NOT USED SEGEMENT. -------------------------------------------------- 4. WHEN COMBINING /CLASSIC/ FARE FAMILY WITH PENALTY CONDITIONS AND /PLUS/ FARE FAMILY WITH NO PENALTY CONDITIONS - THE PENALTY APPLIES PER EACH /CLASSIC/ FARE COMPONENT EVEN IF /CLASSIC/ FARE COMPONENT IS USED FARE FAMILY - - PLUS - FARES WITH PREFIX -FF- - CLASSIC - FARES WITH PREFIX -SF- - BASIC - FARES WITH PREFIX -SS- -------------------------------------------------- 5. IN CASE OF CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND THE APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE FLOWN AND LESS CANCELLATION FEE. THE APPLICABLE ONE WAY IS THE ONE WAY FARE WITHIN THE SAME FARE FAMILY AND THE SAME OR HIGHER RBD. FARE FAMILY - - PLUS - FARES WITH PREFIX -FF- - CLASSIC - FARES WITH PREFIX -SF- - BASIC - FARES WITH PREFIX -SS- -------------------------------------------------- 6. WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARE WITH REFUNDABLE - THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDED. - THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED. -------------------------------------------------- 7. IN CASE OF REFUND OF TICKET WHICH CONTAINS DIFFERENT TYPES OF FARE COMPONENTS /BASIC/CLASSIC/PLUS/ THE SUM OF CANCELLATION FEE OF EVERY FARE COMPONENT AND FOR EVERY SEGMENT MUST BE COLLECTED. -------------------------------------------------- 8. IN CASE OF CANCEL/REFUND 8.1. FOR TOTALLY UNUSED REISSUED TICKET WITH UPGRADE - THE FARE RULE APPLIED BY FIRST ISSUED ORIGINAL TICKET. 8.2. FOR PARTLY USED REISSUED TICKET WITH UPGRADE - THE FARE RULE APPLIED BY REISSUED TICKET -------------------------------------------------- 9. NOT USED TAXES MUST BE RETURNED TO THE PASSENGER. -------------------------------------------------- 10. FOR PARTLY USED REFUNDABLE TICKET IF THE REFUND VALUE CANNOT BE CALCULATED /THERE IS NO ONE WAY FARE OR APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE FLOWN IS HIGHER THAN ROUND TRIP FARE PAID/ YQ/YR SURCHARGES ARE NON-REFUNDABLE. -------------------------------------------------- 11. IN CASE OF USING COUPONS NOT IN THE SEQUENCE SHOWN ON THE TICKET REFUND OF UNUSED SEGMENTS AND YQ/YR TAXES IS NOT PERMITTED. -------------------------------------------------- 12. REFUND OF UNUSED TAXES AND YQ/YR SURCHARGES PERMITTED WITHIN ONE YEAR - FOR UNUSED TICKET FROM THE DAY OF TICKET ISSUE. - FOR PARTLY USED TICKET AFTER DEPARTURE FROM THE DAY OF FIRST FLIGHT. -------------------------------------------------- CHANGES ANY TIME CHARGE USD 40.00 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. WAIVED FOR ILLNESS OR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. CHARGE USD 50.00 FOR NO-SHOW. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY. WAIVED FOR ILLNESS OR DEATH OF PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER. NOTE - 1. WAIVERS MUST BE EVIDENCED BY DEATH CERTIFICATE FAMILY MEMBER- SPOUSE/ CHILDREN INCLUDING ADOPTED/ PARENTS/ BROTHERS/ SISTERS/ GRANDPARENTS/ GRANDCHILDREN/ FATHER-IN-LAW/ MOTHER-IN-LAW/ BROTHERS-IN-LAW/ SISTERS-IN-LAW/ SONS-IN-LAW AND DAUGHTERS-IN-LAW TRAVELLING WITH PASSENGER. -------------------------------------------------- 2. A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE/FARE FAMILY/BRAND CHANGE. -------------------------------------------------- 3. REROUTING IS PERMITED. WHEN THE ONLY COUPONS IN THE TICKET OR REMAINING IN THE TICKET ARE FOR DOMESTIC TRANSPORTATION - SUCH TICKET SHALL NOT BE REROUTED FOR FURTHER INTERNATIONAL CARRIAGE. -------------------------------------------------- 4.CHARGE APPLIED PER EACH CHANGED FARE COMPONENT. -------------------------------------------------- 5. IN CASE OF USING COUPONS NOT IN THE SEQUENCE SHOWN ON THE TICKET REISSUE TICKET NOT PERMITTED. -------------------------------------------------- 6. CHANGES BEFORE DEPARTURE /TOTALLY UNUSED TICKET/ 6.1. WHEN THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED - THE ENTIRE TICKET MUST BE RE-PRICED USING -CURRENT- FARES IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF NEW TICKET ISSUANCE. ----- NEW FARE AMOUNT SHOULD BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS AMOUNT. ----- ANY DIFFERENCE IN FARES PLUS CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED. ----- ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE/MIN STAY/MAX STAY/ SEASONALITY/ETC MUST BE MET. -------------------------------------------------- 6.2.WHEN THERE ARE NO CHANGE TO THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT BUT OTHER FARE COMPONENTS ARE CHANGED - THE ENTIRE TICKET MUST BE RE-PRICED USING -HISTORICAL- FARES IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE. ----- NEW FARE AMOUNT SHOULD BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS AMOUNT. ----- ANY DIFFERENCE IN FARES PLUS CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED. ----- ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE/MIN STAY/MAX STAY/SEASONALITY/ ETC MUST BE MET. -------------------------------------------------- 7. CHANGES AFTER DEPARTURE /PARTLY USED TICKET/ 7.1. THE ENTIRE TICKET MUST BE RE-PRICED USING -HISTORICAL- FARES IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE. ----- NEW FARE AMOUNT SHOULD BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS AMOUNT. ----- ANY DIFFERENCE IN FARES PLUS CHANGE FEE MUST BE COLLECTED. ----- ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE INCLUDING ADVANCE PURCHASE/MIN STAY/MAX STAY/SEASONALITY/ ETC MUST BE MET.

{"fares":[{"fare":"XPW","airline_fil":"Z9","airline_market":"Z9","city_depart":"TSE","city_arrive":"DMB"}],"rules":[[{"rule_code":"RU","rule_title":"RULE APPLICATION","rule_text":"FOR ECONOMY OW EXCURSION - 5TH LEVEL FARES ECONOMY CLASS - XS BRAND APPLICATION AREA THESE FARES APPLY WITHIN AREA 3. "},{"rule_code":"PE","rule_title":"PENALTIES","rule_text":" NOTE - 1.1.CHANGES PERMITTED -MORE THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 20 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. -LESS THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME AND AFTER DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 25 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. CHANGES NOTE - CHARGE IS CALCULATED FROM THE FARE AMOUNT OF CHANGED FARE COMPONENT AND IS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM BSR RATE ON THE DATE OF REISSUE. NEW FARE AMOUNT SHOULD BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS AMOUNT. ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE SHOULD BE MET INCLUDING MIN MAX STAY ADVANCE PURCHASE SEASONALTY ETC. REPRICE OF TOTALLY UNUSED FARE IS BASED ON CURRENT FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF NEW TICKET ISSUANCE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. REPRICE OF PARTLY USED FARE IS BASED ON HISTORICAL FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. THE FARE DIFFERENCE IS CONVERTED INTO THE CURRENCY OF REISSUE AT CURRENT BSR RATE. NOTE - 1.2.UPGRADING- ANY TIME WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY. IN CASE OF UPGRADING THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN NEW FARE AND THE FARE PAID SHOULD BE COLLECTED. ANY OTHER CHARGES FOR REISSUE/ REVALIDATION SHOULD BE COLLECTED ADDITIONALLY. ----------------------------------------- FOR REISSUED TICKET WITH UPGRADE FARE RULES APPLY BY FIRST ISSUED ORIGINAL TICKET FOR CANCEL/REFUND. OTHER UNUSED TAXES SHOULD BE RETURNED TO PASSENGER CANCELLATIONS AFTER DEPARTURE NOTE - 2.2.CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE PERMITTED. AFTER DEPARTURE MEANS PARTLY USED TICKET. CHARGE IS CALCULATED FROM THE FARE AMOUNT OF REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT AND IS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM BSR RATE ON THE DATE OF REFUND. CANCELLATION OF THE TRANSFER FARE AT THE POINT OF TURNAROUND RT-OW. -SEE PARAGRAPH 2.2.CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. 2.3.3.CANCELLATION AT THE TRANSFER INTERMEDIATE POINT ON OUTBOUND IN CASE OF PARTIAL USE OF FARE COMPONENT. REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND ACTUALLY FLOWN YOW FARE OF THE USED OUTBOUND SEGMENT IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF DEPARTURE AND THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DATE IS SHOWN ON THE FIRST FLIGHT COUPON. REFUND CHARGE APPLIES AS SHOWN IN PARAGRAPH 2.2. CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. 2.3.4.CANCELLATION AT THE TRANSFER INTERMEDIATE POINT ON INBOUND IN CASE OF PARTIAL USE OF FARE COMPONENT. REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND THE SUM OF ACTUALLY FLOWN OW TRANSFER FARE IN THE SAME OR HIGHER CLASS OF BOOKING AND ACTUALLY FLOWN YOW FARE OF THE USED INBOUND SEGMENT IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF DEPARTURE AND THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DATE IS SHOWN ON THE FIRST FLIGHT COUPON REFUND CHARGE APPLIES AS SHOWN IN PARAGRAPH 2.2. "},{"rule_code":"PE","rule_title":"PENALTIES","rule_text":" NOTE - 1.1.CHANGES PERMITTED -MORE THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 20 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. -LESS THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME AND AFTER DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 25 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. REPRICE OF PARTLY USED FARE IS BASED ON HISTORICAL FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. THE FARE DIFFERENCE IS CONVERTED INTO THE CURRENCY OF REISSUE AT CURRENT BSR RATE. NOTE - 1.2.UPGRADING- ANY TIME WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY. "},{"rule_code":"PE","rule_title":"PENALTIES","rule_text":" NOTE - 1.1.CHANGES PERMITTED -MORE THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 20 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. -LESS THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME AND AFTER DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 25 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. CHARGE FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION APPLY FOR EACH CHANGED FARE COMPONENT. IF MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT CHANGES SUM UP CHARGES FOR EACH FARE COMPONENT. IN CASE OF FARES COMBINATION WITH DIFFERENT REISSUE CONDITIONS THE CONDITIONS FOR EACH FARE COMPONENT APPLY. CHANGES NOTE - CHARGE IS CALCULATED FROM THE FARE AMOUNT OF CHANGED FARE COMPONENT AND IS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM BSR RATE ON THE DATE OF REISSUE. NEW FARE AMOUNT SHOULD BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS AMOUNT. ALL RULE PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE SHOULD BE MET INCLUDING MIN MAX STAY ADVANCE PURCHASE SEASONALTY ETC. FARE AMOUNT-PUBLISHED FARE LEVEL IN CURRENCY OF THE COUNTRY OF COMMENCEMENT OF TRAVEL. REPRICE OF TOTALLY UNUSED FARE IS BASED ON CURRENT FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF NEW TICKET ISSUANCE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. REPRICE OF PARTLY USED FARE IS BASED ON HISTORICAL FARES TAXES BSR IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE AND SHOULD BE APPLIED FOR ALL SEGMENTS. THE FARE DIFFERENCE IS CONVERTED INTO THE CURRENCY OF REISSUE AT CURRENT BSR RATE. NOTE - 1.2.UPGRADING- ANY TIME WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY. IN CASE OF UPGRADING THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN NEW FARE AND THE FARE PAID SHOULD BE COLLECTED. ANY OTHER CHARGES FOR REISSUE/ REVALIDATION SHOULD BE COLLECTED ADDITIONALLY. ----------------------------------------- FOR REISSUED TICKET WITH UPGRADE FARE RULES APPLY BY FIRST ISSUED ORIGINAL TICKET FOR CANCEL/REFUND. IN CASE OF UPGRADE OF NONREFUNDABLE FARE TO REFUNDABLE FARE THE ORIGINAL NONREFUNDABLE VALUE REMAINS NONREFUNDABLE. ----------------------------------------- FOR REIISUED TICKET WITH UPGRADE FARE RULES APPLY BY NEW REISSUED TICKET FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION. ---------------------------------------- 1.3.DOWNGRADING NOT PERMITTED. 1.4.REROUTING NOT PERMITTED. -------------------- IN CASE OF VOLUNTARY/INVOLUNTARY CHANGES YR TAX IS NOT APPLIED AND IS NOT COLLECTED CANCELLATIONS BEFORE DEPARTURE NOTE - CANCELLATION BEFORE DEPARTURE. 2.1.CANCELLATION BEFORE DEPARTURE PERMITTED. -MORE THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 20 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. -LESS THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME AND AFTER DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 25 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. CHARGE FOR CANCELLATION APPLY FOR EACH REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT. IF MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT IS REFUNDED SUM UP CHARGES FOR EACH FARE COMPONENT. CHARGE IS CALCULATED FROM THE FARE AMOUNT OF REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT AND IS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM BSR RATE ON THE DATE OF REFUND. FARE AMOUNT-PUBLISHED FARE LEVEL IN CURRENCY OF THE COUNTRY OF COMMENCEMENT OF TRAVEL. IN CASE OF FARES COMBINATION WITH DIFFERENT REFUND CONDITIONS THE CONDITIONS FOR EACH FARE COMPONENT APPLY. IN CASE OF VOLUNTARY CANCELLATION/ REFUND - XP AND YR TAXES ARE NONREFUNDABLE. OTHER UNUSED TAXES SHOULD BE RETURNED TO PASSENGER CANCELLATIONS AFTER DEPARTURE NOTE - 2.2.CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE PERMITTED. AFTER DEPARTURE MEANS PARTLY USED TICKET. REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND APPLICABLE ONE WAY FARE IN THE SAME CLASS OF BOOKING OR HIGHER ONE WAY FARE WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DATE IS SHOWN ON THE FIRST FLIGHT COUPON.REFUND CHARGE APPLIES. -MORE THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 20 PERCENT FROM THE FARE COMPONENT. -LESS THAN 90 MINUTES BEFORE FLIGHT DEPARTURE TIME AND AFTER DEPARTURE TIME WITH CHARGE 25 PERCENT FROM THE REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT. CHARGE IS CALCULATED FROM THE FARE AMOUNT OF REFUNDABLE FARE COMPONENT AND IS CONVERTED INTO THE LOCAL CURRENCY USING ACTUAL SYSTEM BSR RATE ON THE DATE OF REFUND. FARE AMOUNT-PUBLISHED FARE LEVEL IN CURRENCY OF THE COUNTRY OF COMMENCEMENT OF TRAVEL. IN CASE OF FARES COMBINATION WITH DIFFERENT REFUND CONDITIONS THE CONDITIONS FOR EACH FARE COMPONENT APPLY. IN CASE OF VOLUNTARY CANCELLATION/ REFUND - XP AND YR TAXES ARE NONREFUNDABLE. OTHER UNUSED TAXES SHOULD BE RETURNED TO PASSENGER NOTE - 2.3.CANCELLATION OF THE TRANSFER FARES 2.3.1.CANCELLATION OF TOTALLY UNUSED TICKET -SEE PARAGRAPH 2.1. CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. 2.3.2. CANCELLATION OF THE TRANSFER FARE AT THE POINT OF TURNAROUND RT-OW. -SEE PARAGRAPH 2.2.CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. 2.3.3.CANCELLATION AT THE TRANSFER INTERMEDIATE POINT ON OUTBOUND IN CASE OF PARTIAL USE OF FARE COMPONENT. REFUND THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE FARE PAID AND ACTUALLY FLOWN YOW FARE OF THE USED OUTBOUND SEGMENT IN EFFECT ON THE DATE OF DEPARTURE AND THE DATE OF ORIGINAL TICKET ISSUE WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DATE IS SHOWN ON THE FIRST FLIGHT COUPON. REFUND CHARGE APPLIES AS SHOWN IN PARAGRAPH 2.2. CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION. 2.3.4.CANCELLATION AT THE TRANSFER INTERMEDIATE POINT ON INBOUND IN CASE OF PARTIAL USE OF FARE COMPONENT.
